claims: The company projects revenue will reach 80 Crore INR in 2026.
The platform has over 700,000 signed-up users.
The average Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC) is 450 INR.
The 4-year customer Lifetime Value (LTV) is 9,000 INR.
The LTV to CAC ratio is 20X.
The company reports a 5.5% revenue margin.
A path to profitability is planned within 18-20 months.
Current Assets Under Advisory (AUA) are 100 Crore INR.
The sign-up-to-goal conversion rate is approximately 25%.
Founder background information is not provided in the document.
